title: manam kanindurugavE
sahitya:
manam kanindurugavE dinamtOrum nI ninaindu vara vENmE nIla mayilOnai


anupallavi

  gaganam dhanam enavE karudik-kanavu kaNDu kavalaikkoNDu mighavum avadhiyurAmal ini


caraNam    nittama avan punita nAmattai dhyAnittu bhakti perugavE tudi paNNiDa maravAmal
siddhamellAm avan sIraDi sArttiDum pittup-piDittAl pErinbamArndiDum
